item.description:
As most of you know the Westboro Baptist Church will be protesting at East Providence High School and other Rhode Island locations on Friday. We will use this meetup to discuss strategy and to make signs. This is getting put together very rapidly so exact details will be available as we figure them out.

If you want to become involved and give these assholes a piece of your mind, this would be the time to do it. Thanks.
item.how_to_find_us: Brick and Brown house just East of Breeze ave on Cresent View Drive
item.name: Westboro Baptist Anti-Protest
